signup.title: Register your shop
signup.text: Register your shop easily with lokabees!
signup.name: What's your name?
signup.check_inbox: Check your Email inbox and confirm your Email to login
signup.accept_terms: By clicking 'Sign Up' you agree to our privacy policy an accept our terms of use.
signup.updates_offers_consent: I want to be informed about new updates and offers. I can withdraw my consent at any time in the future on www.lokabees.de/abmelden or on the end of each e-mail.
